doc.field: Sugar, Maurice: Two letters to Abe Magil [1971-72]; Lyrics and music for the song "Fighting Inflation"; "The Detroit Song Book: Blood, sweat and tears from the 30s (Detroit: The Magazine of Michigan's Metropolis, July 23, 1967); "Feet of Clay" (Michigan State Bar Journal, May 1962)
